</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 225 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=6)

**Prerequisites**
[Druid Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=701)

</column>

---

You gain the initial order spell from your [order](/classes/druid/druidic-orders). If you don’t already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by being one with nature.
